heading: Friday Night
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys. Some clouds, snow showers in the north and mountains late.
temperature: 5 to 10 above north, 10 to 15 in the Champlain Valley and south

heading: Saturday
text: Morning clouds, snow showers in the north and mountains. Increasing sun in southern valleys.

heading: Sunday
text: Mid to upper 20s north, upper 20s to lower 30s south
